name: Inout
description:
You're a member of Inout Inc., an international team of professional exorcists. You deal with the most unpredictable cases of exorcism.

This time, you and your team find yourselves in an old mansion in Madyland. According to locals, horrible things have been going on there for years. They remember a young woman who lived there, raising a gravely ill son. Then, she disappeared, and no one has seen the boy since. Many people tried to uncover what happened, but no one has ever returned from the old mansion. Neighbors say, "There's a lot of evil there!"



  • Exorcism ritual
    Your team's task is to perform the exorcism ritual and to free the possessed from the ancient evil. You need to find all the ritual items. The notes will help you figure out what's what. The most difficult obstacle will be the possessed individual himself. He's always hunting, and in moments of rage, he's especially dangerous. But that's not all. You must also beware of his traps.

  • Sound location
    Listen carefully and you'll stay alive. Rest assured that if your heart is beating, the possessed is somewhere near. The 3D sound location technology will help you know where the possessed is and avoid a deadly encounter. Use headphones for maximum effect.

  • Cooperative multiplayer game
    Team up with up to 4 friends or find players on online servers within the game. Challenging missions are easier and more enjoyable when played as a team, and the built-in voice chat will help you succeed!



  • Protective equipment
    We've made sure you aren't left to fend for yourself without some protection from the possessed. You'll be given a shocker to stun the possessed. If you have the batteries, of course.

  • Game map
    The map has been designed so that your game experience is constantly updated. As you explore the map, you'll learn different tactics to complete the quest.

  • Increasing difficulty
    The further you advance in the ritual, the more dangerous and the faster the possessed becomes.



  • Nightmare mode
    For the most hardcore players, there's Nightmare mode. This is a challenge for true hardcore fans. You'll have to search for a shocker on the map. The number of shockers and batteries is limited. The maniac is extremely dangerous.

  • Solo mode
    Solo mode helps you explore the map, understand the rules, and comprehend how the possessed behaves.

  • Re-play
    Each session's gameplay experience is unique. The locations of ritual items, locked doors, traps, and the possessed's behavior are randomized.
